faq.title:
Frequently Asked
Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about Curri.AI.

item1.question: How accurate are the AI-generated curricula?
item1.answer: Our AI is trained on the latest learning resources and industry best practices. The generated curricula are continuously improved based on user feedback and completion rates.

item2.question: Can I customize the generated curriculum?
item2.answer: Yes! You can edit, add, or remove lessons from any AI-generated curriculum. You can also fork curricula from other users and customize them.

item3.question: Is my learning progress data secure?
item3.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security measures to protect your data. Your learning progress is private and only you can access it.

item4.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the curriculum?
item4.answer: You can always regenerate a curriculum with different parameters, or browse and fork curricula from other successful learners in the community.

item5.question: How much does it cost to use Curri.AI?
item5.answer: Curri.AI offers a free plan with basic features. Premium plans are available for advanced features and unlimited curriculum generation.

item6.question: Can I share my curricula with others?
item6.answer: Yes! You can make your curricula public for others to fork and learn from. This helps build a community of knowledge sharing.
